articles.description: When a “really serious-looking letter” arrived at a remote arts centre, Vincent Namatjira was nervous.
articles.content: Ive done a lot of research into my great-grandfather Albert Namatjiras story, says Namatjira. I feel proud to accept this award and continue the Namatjira legacy as important artists and strong, prou… [+1016 chars]

articles.author: Katie Sewell
articles.title: Meghan Markle title: The ONE title Meghan won’t be able to use anymore - Express
articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE became the Duchess of Sussex upon her marriage to Prince Harry. But due to the couple's decision to step back from senior royal life, Meghan will no longer be using a certain royal title in the future.

articles.title: Ode to Joy is officially Beethoven's top work - News - ABC News
articles.description: The Choral Symphony, featuring the famous Ode to Joy, has taken out top spot in the Classic 100: Beethoven, as voted by ABC Classic listeners.
articles.content:
Australia has voted Ludwig Van Beethovens epic Ninth Symphony featuring the Ode to Joy as their number one in the Classic 100: Beethoven.
